Posts.Content: Sep 3, 2015 02:39PM JanS1234567890 wrote: I get sick too so I started just using Advil. I had a mastectomy 5 weeks ago with all lymph nodes removed. I told the hospital to only give me Advil. I was fine. I've done this for several operations. I've never had a problem and I think it's so much easier to recover without pain medicine.
Posts.Title: Pain Meds make me vomit! What do I do? MizMimi JanS1234567890
